name: Monster Punch
description:
2 Player local fighting game. If you block when attacked you can stack strength multipliers that are applied on your next attack.

Controls:

- Game

- R = Restart

- Player 1

- AD = Move

- W = Jump

- S = Block

- Space = Attack

- Player 2

- Left Arrow / Right Arrow = Move

- Up Arrow = Jump

- Down Arrow = Block

- Right Ctrl = Attack
